TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Engine extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection from the Microsoft.Build assembly instead.")

summary.span: 表示 MSBuild 引擎。

span.span: Represents the MSBuild engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项目到项目依赖项的系统中维护生成项目，因此可以避免在给定生成不止一次生成相同的项目中的相同目标。In a system of project-to-project dependencies, the maintains the building projects, making it possible to avoid building the same target in the same project more than once in a given build. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并使用方法生成的项目文件。The following example creates an object and uses the method to build a project file. 类用于记录到文件的信息。The class is used to log information to a file. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/CS/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_BuildAProject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BuildAProject/VB/Module1.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("If you were simply passing in the .NET Framework location as the BinPath, just change to the parameterless Engine() constructor. Otherwise, you can define custom toolsets in the registry or config file, or by adding elements to the Engine's ToolsetCollection. Then use either the Engine() or Engine(ToolsetLocations) constructor instead.")

span.span: A string of parameters that are used to configure the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine.

param.span: 必须将参数格式化为 ParameterName=ParameterValue。

span.span: You must format the parameters as ParameterName=ParameterValue.

param.span: 下面是有效的可选参数（以分号分隔）：

span.span: The valid semicolon-separated, optional parameters are as follows:

param.span: 指示生成进程在哪里可以找到 MSBuild.exe。

span.span: Indicates where the build process can find MSBuild.exe.

param.span: 此路径允许 [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 引擎定位 MSBuild.exe 并将其作为本地节点启动。

span.span: This path enables the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to locate MSBuild.exe and start it as a local node.

param.span: 是主机唯一的基本参数。

span.span: is the only essential parameter for a host.

param.span: 默认值为 C:\Windows\Microsoft.Net\Framework\v3.5\\。

span.span: The default value is C:\Windows\Microsoft.Net\Framework\v3.5\\.

param.span: 指示生成完成后是否应保留子节点，以便后面的其他生成也可以使用它们。

span.span: Indicates whether the child nodes should remain after the build finishes, in case they can be used later by another build.

param.span: 这些节点在未使用时间超过一分钟后，将被自动丢弃。

span.span: The nodes are discarded automatically after one minute of non-use.

param.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public string BinPath { get; set; }
.property instance string BinPath
Public Property BinPath As String
public: property System::String ^ BinPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Avoid setting BinPath. If you were simply passing in the .NET Framework location as the BinPath, no other action is necessary. Otherwise, define Toolsets instead in the registry or config file, or by adding elements to the Engine's ToolsetCollection, in order to use a custom BinPath.")

summary.span: 获取或设置 MSBuild.exe 的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to MSBuild.exe.
The path to MSBuild.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]3.5，"BinPath"被取代"ToolsPath"。In [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] 3.5, the "BinPath" is superseded by the "ToolsPath." 因此，在。目标文件，请使用 MSBuildToolsPath 而不是 MBBuildBinPath。Therefore, in the .Targets file, use MSBuildToolsPath rather than MBBuildBinPath. 在[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]与正在运行的工具集的对象模型中，"BinPath"相关。In the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] object model, "BinPath" relates to the Toolset you are running. 从生成引擎获取路径的步骤如下所示：The steps to get the path from the build engine are as follows: 1. 获取默认的工具版本。Get the default tools version. 2. 获取工具集映射。Get the Toolset map. 3. 查找工具集，基于在映射中的字符串。Find the Toolset, based on the string in the map. 4. 获取工具集。Get the Toolset. 5. 获取来自工具集的路径。Get the path from the Toolset. 如果你正在使用引擎，则不需要此过程。This procedure is not required if you are creating the engine. 在这种情况下，你已知道工具集的路径。In that case, you already know the Toolset path. 由于解决方案中的项目可以使用不同的工具集，你还可以获取 MSBuild.exe 路径从该项目中，如下所示。Because projects in a solution can use different Toolsets, you can also obtain the MSBuild.exe path from the project, as follows. ``` project.EvaluatedProperties[ReservedPropertyNames.toolsPath].FinalValue ``` 有关工具集的更多信息，请参见`MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`。For more information about Toolsets, see `MSBuild Tool Set (ToolsVersion)`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并使用方法生成的项目文件。The following example creates an object and uses the method to build a project file. 类用于记录到文件的信息。The class is used to log information to a file. MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultToolsVersion { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultToolsVersion
Public Property DefaultToolsVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 此生成引擎的默认 ToolsVersion。

span.span: The default ToolsVersion of this build engine.

value.span: 一个表示默认 ToolsVersion 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the default ToolsVersion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们未否则被告知使用的 ToolsVersion，项目将使用此工具版本。Projects use this ToolsVersion if they are not otherwise told which ToolsVersion to use. 此值检索从.exe.config 文件或注册表。This value is retrieved from either the .exe.config file or the registry. 如果既不指定默认值 ToolsVersion，则版本是硬编码到版本"2.0"。If neither specify a default ToolsVersion, then the version is hard-coded to version "2.0." ToolsVersion 有关的详细信息，请参阅[特定版本的.NET Framework 为生成](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8)。For more information about ToolsVersion, see [Building for Specific Versions of the .NET Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24a6530c-e837-4774-9da0-6893614524d8).

summary.span: 获取或设置项目的全局属性的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of the global properties for the project.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含项目的全局属性。

span.span: A that contains the global properties for the project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 全局属性都是通过设置**/property**切换上的命令行或在生成项目之前由集成的开发环境 (IDE) 设置的属性。Global properties are properties that are set by using the **/property** switch on the command line, or properties that are set by the integrated development environment (IDE) before a project is built. 这些全局属性应用于使用此生成的所有项目。These global properties are applied to all projects that are built by using this .

summary.span: 向生成引擎注册分布式记录器。

span.span: Registers distributed loggers with the build engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是线程安全。This method is not thread-safe. 若要确保统一的行为，所有记录器应都注册生成开始之前。To ensure uniform behavior, all loggers should register before the build is started. 有关详细信息，请参阅[编写可识别多处理器的记录器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516)。For more information, see [Writing Multi-Processor-Aware Loggers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff987d1b-1798-4803-9ef6-cc8fcc263516).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用注册记录器时，它将接收所有生成事件。When a logger is registered with the , it receives all build events. 若要注销记录器，请使用方法。To unregister loggers, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并使用方法生成的项目文件。The following example creates an object and uses the method to build a project file. 类用于记录到文件的信息。The class is used to log information to a file.
